docs.text: Instalation Using PYPI pip install sthali-backend Using GitHub repo git clone https://github.com/project-sthali/sthali-backend.git cd sthali-backend pip install .

docs.text: Requirements Prerequisites python >= 3.10 pip package manager Runtime Dependencies This project requires the following Python packages with specific versions: sthali-crud >= 0.0.7 Optional Dependencies This project has optional dependencies that can be installed for additional features: dev coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1 ruff >= 0.12.0 tests coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1 stage build >= 1.2.1 coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1

docs.text: AppSpecification Represents the specification of a SthaliBackend application.
docs.title: AppSpecification

docs.text: Represents the specification of a SthaliBackend application.
docs.title: AppSpecification

docs.text: Config
docs.title: Config

docs.text: SthaliBackend A class to initialize and configure a FastAPI application with {...}. Args: app_spec (AppSpecification): The specification of the application, including title, description, summary, version, dependencies, and resources. lifespan (collections.abc.Callable[..., typing.Any]): The lifespan of the application. Defaults to default_lifespan.
docs.title: SthaliBackend

docs.text: A class to initialize and configure a FastAPI application with {...}. Args: app_spec (AppSpecification): The specification of the application, including title, description, summary, version, dependencies, and resources. lifespan (collections.abc.Callable[..., typing.Any]): The lifespan of the application. Defaults to default_lifespan.
docs.title: SthaliBackend

docs.text: default_lifespan A context manager that handles the startup and shutdown of Sthali application. Args: app (fastapi.FastAPI): The FastAPI application instance. Yields: None
docs.title: default_lifespan

docs.text: A context manager that handles the startup and shutdown of Sthali application. Args: app (fastapi.FastAPI): The FastAPI application instance. Yields: None
docs.title: default_lifespan
